newsitem.title: THAILAND: Foreign sales send Thai stocks to 6-1/3 year low.
newsitem.headline: Foreign sales send Thai stocks to 6-1/3 year low.

text.p: Thai stocks extended their big losses, tumbling another 2.00 percent on Thursday with the market index falling to its lowest close since January 1991.

Foreign selling of bank stocks led the decline which pushed the SET Index down 12.51 points to 614.06 at the finish. The SET 50 fell 0.94 points, or 2.05 percent, to 45.02 on moderate 3.58 billion baht turnover.
